content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you like the apartment. I'm sure you realize that this apartment is in high demand due to its prime location in the city center. I am looking for a monthly rent of 2,500 euros. Let's see if we can find a mutual agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is a quite high price. Considering the apartment is unfurnished and quite simple, I think the price should be lower. How about 1,500 euros per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your point, but the location of the apartment is unbeatable. It's close to everything you need, and the area is safe and quiet. I am willing to negotiate a bit, but 1,500 euros is too low. How about we meet at 2,200 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is still too high for me. Considering the current market situation, I think 1,800 euros per month would be more reasonable.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your point, but 1,800 euros is still too low for an apartment of this quality and location. How about we meet at 2,000 euros per month? This is my final offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I agree to the price of [2,000] Euro!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [2,000] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Yi-Nuo. The contract will be sent to you in the next few days. Please let me know if you have any questions.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Thank you, Yi-Nuo. I look forward to a long and successful tenancy. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to ask.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Is there anything else you need to discuss before we sign the contract?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: No, Yi-Nuo, there is nothing else to discuss. I am pleased with the agreement we have reached. Please let me know when you receive the contract, and we can proceed with the signing.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your time, Yi-Nuo. The contract will be sent to you by email within the next 24 hours. Please let me know if you have any issues with the content of the contract.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Thank you, Peter. I will review the contract carefully and let you know if I have any concerns. I look forward to receiving it.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Here is the contract, as promised. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns.

[Contract attached]

[Your name]
[Your email]
[Your phone number]
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Thank you, Yi-Nuo. I have reviewed the contract, and everything looks in order. If you have no objections, we can proceed with the signing. Please let me know when you have signed the contract, and I will do the same.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I have signed the contract. Here is the signed copy.

[Signed contract attached]

[Your name]
[Your email]
[Your phone number]
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Thank you, Yi-Nuo. I have also signed the contract. This officially concludes our negotiation and marks the beginning of our tenancy agreement. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact me.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Yi-Nuo. I am looking forward to a successful and long-term partnership. If you need anything else, please let me know.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Thank you, Yi-Nuo. If you need anything else, please let me know. I am here to assist you in any way I can. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
